name: 幼龙崽
description: 刚破壳而出的幼龙，虽然还不会飞但已经展现出高傲的性格。喜欢闪亮的宝物。

image_prompts.design: A baby dragon with azure blue scales and undeveloped wings. Two small horns on head, diamond-shaped tail tip. Low poly style with faceted geometric surfaces, sharp edges on scales, ink sketch texture on wing membranes, non-reflective surface with matte azure blue tones, proud and curious hatchling.
